casebody.data:
Village of Southampton, Appellant, v Elaine Platt, Respondent. Submitted February 14, 1977; decided March 31, 1977

Reported below, 55 AD2d 603.

Motion to dismiss defendant’s cross appeal granted and the cross appeal dismissed, without costs, upon the ground that there is no substantial constitutional question directly involved (CPLR 5601, subd [b], par 1); and upon the ground that the dissent at the Appellate Division is not on a question of law in favor of the party taking the cross appeal (CPLR 5601, subd [a], par [i]).
